author: Isaac Escobar
text: BRO PUCCA IS ON NETFLIX WHAT!

author: Isaac Escobar
text: That’s why we gotta back him. He is our perfect manager. https://t.co/Fksyn23ZJH

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I predicted to my friends that an English side would win the UCL but man duck that prediction i want Madrid to win it all.

author: Isaac Escobar
text: It breaks my heart that chelsea was as close as city were to making it past Madrid.

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I didn’t expect it from a Real Madrid team without Cristiano Ronaldo but man Benzema stepped up in every game so the rest of the team owed him that. I’m happy a youngster in Rodrygo got it done. What a team. https://t.co/gIB91uvq1i

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I will cry if Eden hazard wins the UCL idc if he did nothing for it. Chelsea owed him that but never got it then when he left we won it. I’ll be super happy if he wins it. Who knows maybe he wins it then comes back to Chelsea 🤔

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Being English gives him more credit while also doing it while fighting for promotion. While Ampadu is playing for a relegation side. I rate them both but ampadu is long overdue a chance at chelsea. Hope to see them both the team next season. https://t.co/RBaZdvlb4V

author: Isaac Escobar
text: This picture just got better 🥶🥶 https://t.co/PZR0UQLzGZ

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Rodrygo what a guy. Saved them from Chelsea now saving them from Man City.

author: Isaac Escobar
text: SPOKE SO SOON

author: Isaac Escobar
text: IDGAF who signs him but take him! 75m minimum https://t.co/zVX6hXnVYI

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I knew an English team would win the UCL but man I hope it isn’t city

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Hope he redeems himself. I’m not against him staying if he can be successful but I’m not against the same either. I want to build a team like city has or Liverpool has that solely fits the managers ideas. Back Tuchel man I know he’s that guy for us.

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I’ll be honest I didn’t think he would succeed under Tuchel. Of course I backed him as he signed to be a chelsea player but I didn’t fancy him. He started so well that I thought man maybe he has that Diego Costa dog in him but it last like 10 games.. haven’t seen that dog since. https://t.co/dnaj2Ak6JL

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Bruno probably got Mounts and De Gea probably got Mendys. https://t.co/PYpoMz0ImA

author: Isaac Escobar
text: The disrespect Sarr gets. Is he the best absolutely not but they are getting judged while playing LCB with ALONSO next to him which makes him worse. On top of that most of sarrs appearances have been at LB. Saul has been terrible. He had one decent game. Azpi is a sub at best. https://t.co/Z7DiOYgm2J

author: Isaac Escobar
text: They can take all 3 if they give us De Ligt in exchange. https://t.co/bkXIsUkUjd

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I just gotta say Unai Emery has won the Europa League with the team. Taking them to a semi final in the UCL and ALMOST eliminating Liverpool to make the final. Clearly he was not the problem at PSG nor Arsenal. https://t.co/r03hExHcAd

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Maatsen/Broja/Gallagher/Gilmour deserve it as well. If we sell Kepa I wouldn’t mind keeping Baxter. https://t.co/H5wwlWA8n5

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Villareal should be proud of that first half and to make it to the semi final ain’t easy. Beat a Bayern Munich and Juventus along the way, not the strongest squads but the name is there. Liverpool in the final vs who? 🤔

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Why would they do that to Diaz 🫠…also suga about to go back to the prelims after getting kicked apart by Pedro. https://t.co/K4wZXjr7BZ

text: Damn didn’t see that coming..

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I don’t get why being a Ronaldo fan means you have to hate Messi or why being a Messi fan means you have to hate Ronaldo. They are both the best players in the world and everyone has an opinion about who’s better it’s okay. https://t.co/uCDzGgtVkh

text: Don’t give up but also don’t get cut from the ufc. A tough task for many as top names go after being 0-3/0-4. https://t.co/ffu60S2enA

text: I’d take him at chelsea if he wasn’t valued so stupidly. 100m my ass. 35m at best. https://t.co/pSNE20gAmN

text: It’s so hard man. We all thought Dustin would beat Olivera but Dustin didn’t. I would normally expect Gaethje to win but I’m gonna say Olivera gets it done in R2. https://t.co/wUGvbW3lyB

text: 30m-40m + Lewandowski would be valid.. or even a Sane. https://t.co/6oPBp1YvVH

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I’d love a scenario where we get Kane and son to chelsea but it’s so unrealistic. We’d be so good with them both in our team. I’d let go of any front man apart from Mount/Havertz. Those two stay at all cost.

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Personally I think if we stick with 3421 I’d like to add Nkunku as I think the mix of him Havertz and Mount would combine well. If we going to 433 I think direct wingers are needed which is why I’d love Raphina/Anthony for RW and for LW would I think we’d be fine with Pulisic/CHO https://t.co/9gOqKWnSWm

author: Isaac Escobar
text: We play spurs watford wolves and Leeds. That’s 2 potential relegation sides and 2 top 4-8 teams.. https://t.co/2AeY5V0AgD

author: Isaac Escobar
text: Havertz got ice in his veins 🥶 https://t.co/H1cIrpT5XF

author: Isaac Escobar
text: I love my chelsea team but we been charity fc lately and I’m pissed. How we give arsenal that win? How we not get 3pts vs United? Now we lose to a potential relegation team in Everton? Shameful as of lately. We better not be a charity team in that FA cup final.

text: Im super happy for Chito man. I knew he’d be a problem from the moment he started in the ufc. Told my boys about him as well. May god protect him and may he be a champion 🤘🏻
